meanings.definition: The quality or condition of being usual.
meanings.sent1: The usualnesses of his daily routine brought comfort and predictability.
meanings.sent2: The usualnesses of her behavior made her easy to understand.
meanings.sent3: The party had a touch of usualnesses with a surprise twist at the end.
meanings.sent4: His usualnesses was like a well-worn path through a familiar forest.
meanings.sent5: The usualnesses of the sunrise was a reassuring sight each morning.

meanings.definition: The state of being typical or customary.
meanings.sent1: The usualnesses of their traditions was cherished by the community.
meanings.sent2: In that town, the usualnesses of starting work early was common.
meanings.sent3: The play added a dash of usualnesses to the classic story, making it fresh.
meanings.sent4: The usualnesses of her smile lit up the room like a beacon.
meanings.sent5: The usualnesses of the holiday decorations brought joy to all who passed by.
